name: Waffle Dreams [Bad Unfinished Game Alert]
description:
This was a submission for WeeklyGameJam and GameFactoryJam. This game is unfinished due to my temporary creative blocks, procrastination and my laziness. I just count this submission as one of my learning experiences for learning the Godot Engine for self-improvement.

Also just wanna let you know that your speakers aren't broken, there are no sounds in this game.

Anyway just escape forward from the evil pancakes to the light and escape your dream (nightmare).

up,down,left,right - move
